text: Kunwar Natwar Singh (16 May 1929 (correct date as per his own autobiographiis 16 May 1931) - 10 August 2024) was an Indian politician. He was born in Bharatpur, Bharatpur State. Singh was Minister of External Affairs from May 2004 through December 2005. He was a member of the Indian National Congress. Singh died in Gurugram, India on 10 August 2024, at the age of 95.Former Foreign Minister Natwar Singh passes away at 95 ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Rajasthani politicians
title: K. Natwar Singh
